about_the_game:
The quirky tale of a lost robot on a huge adventure!

Play as a headless robot named JEFF-3 on his quest to escape the chaotic Industrial Megacenter. Navigate your clumsy body through bizarre obstacles, solve mind-boggling problems, and overcome head-twisting laws of physics all from the eyes of your detached head!

Erase what you know about perspective and prepare for hilarious failures in your quest to get your head on straight!



Headless JEFF-3 offers a unique take on an under-utilized concept in 2nd-person perspective. Everything is viewed from JEFF-3’s detached head, and the body is separate from the head. You are, essentially, seeing yourself!



Your head is both a tool of knowledge and a moveable camera. Play around with different angles and views by picking up your head and tossing it around different areas of the factory.


Interact with conveyor belts, throw crates around, avoid hazards, and poke your brain with solutions to overcome complex puzzles.


You also have access to security cameras that are scattered around the Industrial Megacenter. Use them to view hard-to-reach areas when your body goes out of sight.



MAIN STORY - 12 x 4 chapters for 48 levels of fun and puzzle-solving action!

MULTIPLAYER - Explore the Megacenter together in Co-Op play... but be warned, two heads, twice the chaos!

LEVEN EDITOR - Steam Workshop compatible level editor. Share, build and challenge the online community with your custom content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: 7th Generation Intel Quad Core / 1st Generation Ryzen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
